entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023
